items.content_html: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
items.title: leoneldonati/livio-web: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
